message: Using mutable data structures for teaching purposes is usually discouraged. Replace Hashtables by standard tree-like maps or consider Hash-Array Mapped Tries (HAMT). Use mutable `ref`erences and mutable structure fields only if it is really required. In all places where it is needed indeed, describe in a comment why it is needed there.
